title: War With Love
description: *New Adult Romantic Suspense STANDALONE*Jackson Blanc has ruthlessly assassinated dozens of targets. His kills are quick, clean and executed without regret.Until he meets a girl who forces him to become more than a killer.Noelle Kinsley wants to save the world through science. As a college student, sheâ€™s immersed in her studies and research.Until she meets a captivating hitman who tempts her to want more. With unknown enemies chasing them and the assassin becoming the target, Jackson and Noelle must work together to survive.Surviving the threats against them will be hard enough, but surviving each other will have them at War With Love.
author: April Brookshire
